column4: my keyboard doesn't work in gnome apps anymore. can somebody help me?
can you redefine it using System->Preferences->Keyboard?
there is the correct keyboard layout set
redefine it anyway
after doing some X config wrong, I had to do that otherwise, no chance to have my keyboard working properly again...
I did it already yesterday ;)
sigh... no idea then, sorry.
euh... 1 idea: did you remove the checkmark from the use per-window settings? (or something like that)
per-window, per-app, cannot remember now
whats that?
wait, opening the applet

a more detailed desciption: I switched the system language from german to english, and the problem occur only to windows I switched back and for (either with alt-tab or mouse click) there are no problems in kde apps (amarok)
on the 2nd tab (Distribuciones in ES, I guess it's called Layout in EN) there's a checkmark called something like "separate group per window", did you try unchecking it?
maybe related to what I just wrote above...
I see...
do I have to restart the X ?
cannot tell... I did.
I unchecked it now, but until now it had no effect.... I have a look to the other settings and try a restart now...
good luck
so after restart: the problem seems to be away now. thank you ;)
I was waiting for you to reconnect to ask. yw.
